backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing per‑user rooms, devices, profiles, support tickets, and access control with auto‑provisioning and default room creation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend React components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and dark‑theme OKLCH variable definitions for layout, colors, and UI surfaces.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with dark mode enabled and root container mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller handling navigation, security gateway gating, room‑details routing, and layout via AppShell.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LiveSt: Dashboard statistics section computing device activity, health, and energy data with charts and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/widget: Renders a donut-style pie chart from device category data, computing slice angles and handling empty states.
Draws a 24h energy consumption line chart with gradient fill, grid lines, and point markers based on computed SVG path data.
Displays a circular gauge showing home health percentage with color‑coded ranges and animated stroke values.
frontend/src/components/effects/GlassCar: Wraps children in a glass‑styled card with optional tilt interactivity using the Tilt component.
frontend/src/components/effects/Tilt.tsx: Applies a mouse‑based 3D tilt effect to wrapped content unless reduced‑motion is enabled.
Provides the main application layout with fixed sidebar, header, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Renders the top brand header with styled title text.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Displays the sidebar navigation with active states, quick action handling, and premium footer content.
frontend/src/components/rooms/BulkAddDev: Implements a dialog for creating multiple devices at once, validating names, assigning IDs, and handling auth errors.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateDevi: Dialog for creating a device with validation, auto‑provisioning retry, and next‑ID calculation.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateRoom: Dialog for creating rooms with name/color validation, 100‑room cap, and auto‑provisioning retry logic.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDashbo: Displays room devices, power controls, brightness sliders, and electricity stats with loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDevice: Clickable room card showing basic info with controls for settings and adding devices.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsEditM: Overlay for bulk editing room names, letting users select and rename rooms.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomSettin: Dialog to edit room name, color, and hidden state with validation and provisioning retry handling.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsListS: Provides a skeleton placeholder layout for the rooms list page using glass cards and skeleton UI elements.
frontend/src/components/security/AccessI: Displays an access error message with a retry provisioning button tied to auto‑provisioning logic.
frontend/src/components/security/Provisi: Renders a glass‑styled card showing provisioning status with optional retry actions and dynamic icons/messages.
frontend/src/components/security/QRScann: Implements a dialog for scanning QR codes with camera handling, auto‑start, error states, and scan callbacks.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Bas: Thin wrapper component that renders the RealisticHomeModel 3D interior.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/con: Full‑screen transparent touch area for mobile look rotation excluding joystick space. Emits yaw/pitch updates unless disabled.
Hook implementing pointer‑lock mouse‑look rotation with bounds and lifecycle cleanup. Activates only when enabled and canvas is clicked.
Hook that tracks touch dragging to update yaw and pitch with clamped pitch and resets when disabled.
Hook that tracks WASD key presses and exposes movement direction booleans, resetting when disabled.
On‑screen joystick for movement with deadzone filtering and touch/mouse support. Emits normalized movement vectors and resets when disabled.
Combines WASD, mouse‑look, joystick, and touch‑look to move the 3D camera. Handles room teleportation and clamps movement to navigation bounds.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/dev: Defines 3D positions for named devices and helpers to query or filter devices with mapped positions.
Dialog UI for toggling a light device and adjusting brightness with auth‑error handling.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/hot: 3D animated hotspot orb that responds to hover and click to trigger device selection.
Renders hotspots above mapped devices and forwards selection clicks when dialog is closed.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/lig: Shows light fixture meshes at device positions with emissive intensity based on on/off state and brightness.
Sets up ambient, directional, and point lights plus device‑driven point lights tied to brightness.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/map: Defines 2D floorplan click regions with geometry and zoom transforms for each room.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Rea: Defines a detailed Three.js scene of a home interior with walls, floor, ceiling, molding, and furniture meshes.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/roo: Static navigation bounds per room used to constrain camera movement after teleporting.
Predefined camera spawn positions and yaw rotations for teleporting into each room.
Invisible picker that infers room selection from camera position on click unless disabled.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Roo: Dialog listing available rooms and allowing users to select one for 3D teleportation.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Sma: Sidebar showing room device status with master on/off controls, loading and error states, and retry support.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Vir: Renders an interactive 2D floorplan with zoomable room regions and selection handling. Applies animated transforms unless reduced motion is preferred.
React error boundary that catches 3D scene rendering errors and reports them via a callback. Displays nothing when an error occurs.
Provides buttons to switch between 2D map and 3D walkthrough modes. Highlights the currently active mode.
Main 3D scene setup including lighting, interior, device hotspots, navigation, and surface picking. Manages device dialogs, teleportation, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on changes.
Automatically provisions authenticated users by calling initializeAccess once per actor session, exposing status and retry controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomSidebarActio: Manages a customizable sidebar action stored in localStorage, providing config state and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles loading, login, logout, and stored delegation restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the browser's reduced‑motion preference and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, rooms, and room details with backend actor integration and timeouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecurityGateway.ts: Context for validating, storing, and unlocking a secret key with session persistence and locking controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebGLSupport.ts: Checks if WebGL is supported at runtime and reports success or an explanatory error.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables, components, and visual effects like glass surfaces.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers, and mounts it.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with device and room stats, using hooks to fetch rooms and devices and displaying summary cards and a 3D explore button.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information for a specific room, handling loading and error states, and rendering a RoomDashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Shows a paginated, filterable list of rooms with edit and sidebar interactions, using provisioning state and room summary queries.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityGatewayPage.t: Provides a security key input and QR scan option to unlock the app, validating the key and handling errors.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays appearance settings and allows configuring a custom sidebar action, including showing and copying the secret key.
frontend/src/pages/SupportInfoPage.tsx: Offers a searchable knowledge base and a support ticket form with validation, using a mutation to submit tickets.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualHome3DPage.tsx: Full-screen 2D/3D virtual home page managing WebGL support, room selection, mode switching, and rendering errors.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Classifies authorization-related backend errors and provides user-friendly messages and retry guidance.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Adds a timeout wrapper to any promise that rejects with a custom error if it exceeds a given duration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params and storing/loading Rooms page UI state in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, shadows, and keyframes for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state defining requirements for removing manual room creation, showing rooms by selected count, and adding a Room Details page.
